summary: The article details the updates in MkDocs AI Summary, introducing features like multi-AI service support, adaptive environment configuration, intelligent caching system, and flexible configuration options. It highlights functionalities such as AI service integration, content cleaning, cache management, and API key handling. Technical features include unified API requests, error handling, timeout control, and display optimizations. Planned features include multi-AI service support, automatic API selection, and enhanced API key security.
page_title: MkDocs AI 摘要更新日志
